about_the_game: This game plunges you into a challenging universe set against a cosmic backdrop, where you control a ball navigating through the void of space, dodging various obstacles to rack up the highest score possible. The visuals are minimalistic yet refined, with a deep black background that sets off the vivid colors of the ball and obstacles, creating stark visual contrasts. The sound effects are concise and impactful, punctuating each successful dodge with crisp audio feedback that heightens the game's tension. Players use the WASD keys for precise movements, tackling the game's high difficulty levels as each level presents unique layouts that test reaction speed and dexterity. As you progress through increasingly difficult stages, you'll experience the joy of growth through repeated attempts.

name: Recall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti or AMD R9 380
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
